replies.message: Than you Need to check where hè came from dude! And Who helpen him a hand... dre. . And How come dre worked  for him self. .. left shug  why??? After easy. ... Hey Robbin he can respect Eminem if he's wants u can't tell him otherwise. I do!  2pacs dead as a doornail 4 Christ sake! Thugs don't need em this world s bad enough! Rap God= EMINEM! Google that up would ya brah!?
